section-1.heading: Stay Productive
section-1.details: In this age of communication, keep in touch with your contacts across the internet without access to an active internet connection. Store your access to your favourite communications platforms while online, use them while offline.

section-2.heading: How it works
section-2.details: Using SWOB is as easy as authenticating your credentials

2.heading: Go to Wallet
2.details: select and store the platform for which you want access for later offline uses

3.heading: Get the SWOB app from the Playstore
3.details: Goto your SWOB profile online and click on Sync. Use your SWOB app to scan your QR code

4.heading: Use App
4.details: Enter your password in the app and begin transmitting messages while offline using SMS messages

1.heading: Accessibility
1.details: SWOB’s mobile app allows users to have offline communication wherever they are. With as simple as having an SMS message smartphone you can maintain communications with your online platforms

2.heading: Security
2.details: SWOB transmits messages in securely encrypted formats. This secures every communication from being accessed by intermediate parties while in transit.

3.heading: Open source
3.details: Every component of SWOB is open sourced! From the mobile app to the routing mechanisms we use to get your SMS messages to reach your intended platforms

4.heading: Decentralized
4.details: SWOB is built to work in decentralized models. Anyone can host a SWOB server. It’s as easy as understanding how to use it

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.details: Using SWOB is as easy as authenticating your credentials

alerts.account-created: your account has been created, please login
alerts.registration-error: Sorry we could not complete your registration. If error persists, please contact support

wallet.heading: Wallet
wallet.details: Store your tokens which will be used for authentication on your behalf in the event of an internet shutdown. You can define how this tokens will be used by setting the scopes of access

revoke-dialog.heading: Revoke Token
revoke-dialog.details: This will permanently remove this token from your account and cannot be reversed. Enter your password to Confirm

alerts.load-error: Sorry we could not load platforms. If error persists, please contact support

phone-verification.heading: Telegram
phone-verification.details: Please fill in your phone number to begin

alerts.code-sent: A verification code has been sent to your phone. Check code in your sms or email inbox
alerts.authorization-error: Sorry, you are not authorized to make this request

alerts.no-account: You do not have a telegram account, please fill the form to create one

code-verification.heading: Verification
code-verification.paragraph-1: A verification code has been sent to your phone. Please enter it below. This process confirms the number provided is active and can be used for communication when the time comes.
code-verification.paragraph-2: We also require you to provide the code sent to you by SMS as a means of guaranteeing you have the necessary (own) rights to the required phone number. This will help us prevent actors from using non consented phone numbers to create accounts - preventing the owners from further doing so

error-messages.otp-request: Sorry we could not verify your phone number. If error persists, please contact support
error-messages.otp-validation: Sorry we could not verify your code. If error persists, please contact support

section-1.alert-message: Sorry it seems you havent stored any tokens
section-1.details: Please click on the link below to store tokens

summary.caption: learn more
summary.details: Synchronization becomes available only after you perform an action that updates your security configurations. An example is storing access in the wallet.

section-2.paragraph-1: This lets you use the SW/OB secure gateway for all messages
section-2.paragraph-2: Synchronization becomes available only after you perform an action that updates your security configurations. An example is storing access in the wallet.
section-2.paragraph-3: Please follow these steps to sychronize your saved access with SMSwithoutborders mobile app.

sync-steps.three: Point your phone to this screen to capture the code
